# üîê Secure Password Generator

A simple and powerful **Password Generator App** built using **Streamlit**. Generate strong and secure passwords with custom options.

## üöÄ Features
- ‚úÖ Choose password length (6 to 50 characters)
- ‚úÖ Include **digits** and **special characters**
- ‚úÖ Beautiful **dark theme** UI
- ‚úÖ One-click password generation
- ‚úÖ **Copy to Clipboard** feature
- ‚úÖ Deployable on **Streamlit Cloud**
